hero.title: ExpenseTracker AI
hero.subtitle: Track your expenses, manage your budget, and get AI-powered insights to take control of your finances.

features.aiInsightsDesc: Smart analysis of your spending patterns

faq.description: Everything you need to know about ExpenseTracker AI and how it can transform your financial management.

a.whatIs: ExpenseTracker AI is an intelligent financial management tool that uses artificial intelligence to help you monitor your spending patterns, get smart category suggestions, and receive personalized insights to improve your financial health.
a.howAI: Our AI analyzes your spending data to automatically categorize expenses, detect patterns, and provide personalized recommendations. You can also ask the AI questions about your spending habits and get instant, intelligent responses.
a.isFree: Yes, ExpenseTracker AI offers a free plan with basic AI features including smart categorization and insights. Premium plans are available for advanced AI analytics and unlimited AI interactions.

testimonials.description: Join thousands of satisfied users who have transformed their financial habits with ExpenseTracker AI.

card1.name: Sarah L.
card1.quote: ExpenseTracker AI has completely transformed my budgeting. The AI insights are incredibly helpful and I now have full control over my finances!

card2.name: John D.
card2.quote: The AI-powered insights from ExpenseTracker have helped me identify and reduce unnecessary spending. The smart categorization is amazing!

card3.name: Emily R.
card3.quote: ExpenseTracker AI is so intelligent and easy to use. The AI recommendations are spot-on and have genuinely improved my financial habits!

footer.tagline: Intelligent financial management powered by AI. Track your expenses, manage your budget, and gain insights into your spending patterns.

hero.title: About ExpenseTracker AI
hero.subtitle: Your intelligent companion for tracking expenses and managing your finances with cutting-edge AI-powered insights.

mission.title: Transforming Financial Management with AI
mission.description: At FinvestorAI, we leverage cutting-edge artificial intelligence to revolutionize how individuals achieve financial wellness. Our AI analyzes your spending patterns to deliver personalized recommendations and actionable insights that lead to better budgeting and financial freedom.

features.title: Why Choose ExpenseTracker AI?
features.subtitle: Discover the powerful features that make our AI-driven platform the smart choice for modern financial management.

aiInsights.title: AI-Powered Insights
aiInsights.description: Get intelligent analysis of your spending patterns with personalized AI recommendations and automated category suggestions that learn from your behavior.

smartCategorization.title: Smart Categorization
smartCategorization.description: Let our AI automatically categorize your expenses with 99% accuracy and provide tailored recommendations to enhance your budget management effortlessly.

intelligentDashboard.title: Intelligent Dashboard
intelligentDashboard.description: Experience a modern, AI-enhanced interface that adapts to your financial goals, providing clear visualizations and instant insights that make sense.

team.title: The Visionaries Behind ExpenseTracker AI
team.subtitle: Our passionate team of developers, AI experts, and financial analysts is dedicated to making intelligent financial management accessible to everyone.

ceo.name: Keerti
ceo.bio: A passionate innovator dedicated to merging AI with financial empowerment. Keerti leads the vision and development of ExpenseTracker AI with precision and purpose.

cta.title: Start Tracking Smarter with AI
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users already improving their financial lives with AI-powered insights and smart tracking.

hero.title: Contact ExpenseTracker AI
